message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'd really enjoy. I'm offering it to you for $140. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! I'm willing to come down a little further, but $125 is still a bit low for me. How about $135?  That would be a good deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
